CustomField.description: Check If Owner of work order is queue and the same branch with user
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CONTAINS( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName , $User.RTL_Branch_Code__c ), Owner:User.RTL_Branch_Code__c = $User.RTL_Branch_Code__c) && NOT( ISBLANK( $User.RTL_Branch_Code__c )) , TRUE , IF( OR(CONTAINS( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName , TEXT($User.Segment__c) ), TEXT(Owner:User.Segment__c) = TEXT($User.Segment__c) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT($User.Segment__c) )) , TRUE , FALSE ))
CustomField.label: Is My Team
